articles.title: What Happens to UK Companies After US Court Ruling?
articles.summary: UK companies are unsure what will happen after a US court said no to some taxes called tariffs that President Trump made. The court stopped tariffs from last year, but Trump says he will make new 10% taxes on many countries, including the UK. This means UK businesses might have to pay more money when trading with the US. Experts say it is still unclear for companies. The UK government is trying to talk with the US to lower tariffs, especially on things like steel and cars. Trump is unhappy with the court's decision and promises to bring back the tariffs in another way. This creates confusion for UK firms trying to plan their business.

articles.title: Tennis Star Wins Big Match in Dubai
articles.summary: Elina Svitolina, a tennis player from Ukraine, won an exciting match against Coco Gauff from America at the Dubai Tennis Championships. The match was very long, lasting over three hours, and Svitolina won 6-4, 6-7, 6-4. This victory means she will play in the final against Jessica Pegula, another American player. Svitolina had won this tournament before in 2017 and 2018. She said she tried her best and played like there was no tomorrow. In another tennis event, Carlos Alcaraz from Spain won his match and is doing very well this year. Venus Williams, a famous tennis player, will play in a tournament in California.

articles.title: Sam and Olivia's Song Climbs to Number One After a Long Wait
articles.summary: Sam Fender and Olivia Dean have made history in the UK music charts. Their song, Rein Me In, reached number one after 35 weeks, which is the longest time any song has spent in the top 40 before becoming number one. The song is a duet about a relationship ending and was first released last June. It had been at number five three times before finally reaching the top. Sam said the song took a long time to become popular because people discovered it online over time. Olivia added a new verse from a female perspective, making the song better. They performed it together at big stadiums in London and Newcastle. This is Sam's first number one single, while Olivia has had other hits. The song replaced Taylor Swift's Opalite at number one.

articles.title: President Trump's Tariffs and the Supreme Court
articles.summary: President Donald Trump used tariffs, which are taxes on goods from other countries, to change how the world trades. He wanted to make other countries pay more to sell things in America. But the Supreme Court, the highest court in the U.S., said he could not use emergency powers for some of these tariffs. This means some tariffs are now lower, but not all of them. Tariffs can make things more expensive, but importers have found ways to avoid high costs. The president might try other ways to keep tariffs high. This affects trade with countries like China and Europe.

articles.title: Eric Dane's Brave Fight Against ALS
articles.summary: Eric Dane was an actor from the TV show Grey's Anatomy. He got sick with a disease called ALS, which makes muscles stop working. Even though he was very sick, he spent his last months helping others. He raised money and told people about ALS to find a cure. He said he wanted to save his life and help many others too. He joined a group called Target ALS to support research. He also acted in a TV show to teach people about the disease. Eric Dane worked hard to make things better for people with ALS before he passed away.

articles.title: Taylor Swift and KPop Stars Rule Music in 2025
articles.summary: In 2025, Taylor Swift and KPop stars were the biggest music hits. Taylor Swift's album 'The Life of a Showgirl' sold the most copies worldwide. Ros√© from Blackpink had the top song 'APT' with Bruno Mars, which got over two billion streams. This song has some Korean words and is the first non-English song to be number one globally. Another KPop group, Huntr/x, had the second biggest song 'Golden'. The IFPI, a music group, made these charts. Many songs in the top 10 were from earlier years, and no British artists were in the top 10. This shows how popular KPop and Taylor Swift are around the world.
